abstract: Former Harrisburg, Pa, Mayor Stephen Reed is arrested on corruption charges, including hundreds of counts of theft and misuse of government funds and property for buying thousands of artifacts for plan to open Wild West museum, which never happened.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Reed, the former mayor of Harrisburg, Pa., was arrested Tuesday on corruption charges.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Former Mayor Faces Charges He Stole From Harrisburg
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Former Mayor Faces Charges He Stole From Harrisburg

snippet: Stephen Reed, the former mayor of Harrisburg, Pa., was arrested Tuesday on corruption charges.
